title: Dynamic Ad Insertion for VOD
description: An agent needs to configure an advertising campaign for a new movie being added to a VOD catalog, targeting specific viewer demographics.

tasks.description: Create a new ad campaign for the movie.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up a new campaign in the ad management system.

tasks.description: Define the targeting parameters for the campaign (e.g., viewers aged 18-34 in the United States).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets the demographic and geographic targeting rules.

tasks.description: Assign ad creatives to the campaign and set the ad pods (e.g., one pre-roll, two mid-roll ads).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uploads the ad videos and configures the ad break structure.

tasks.description: Activate the campaign to run alongside the movie's release.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully activates the ad campaign.
